template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

  <%- include(_path+'seo') %>

  <% if(_production){ %>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="<%- page.srcfix %>css/bundle.css">
  <% }else{ %>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="<%- page.srcfix %>css/fontawsome.css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="<%- page.srcfix %>css/tailwind.css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="<%- page.srcfix %>css/main.css">
  <% }%>
</head>

<body>
  <%- include(_path+"navbar") %>
  <%- body %>
  <%- include(_path+"footer") %>
  
  <% if(_production){ %>
  <script src="<%- page.srcfix %>js/bundle.js"></script>
  <% }else{ %>
  <script src="<%- page.srcfix %>js/alpine.js"></script>
  <script src="<%- page.srcfix %>js/main.js"></script>
  <% }%>
</body>

</html>

posts.name: getting-started.html
posts.content: this page is still in development

pages.name: index.html
pages.content: this page is still in development

pages.name: posts.html
pages.content: <% site.posts.forEach(element => { %> <%- element.data.title %> <% }) %>
